title: Ensuring That Government Use of Technology Serves the Public: Addendum
descriptions: Document submitted August 2, 2023, as an addendum to testimony before the U.S. House Committee on Oversight and Accountability, Subcommittee on Cybersecurity, Information Technology, and Government Innovation on June 22, 2023.
